Tutorial¶

Requirements¶

You need the following Python 3 libraries:

  • NumPy
  • SciPy
  • Matplotlib
  • netCDF4

Data input¶

The data used must be in the netCDF4 format. The axis of the velocity components are ordered like z, y, x, where z can also be the number of samples in a 2D field.

The variable names should be changed in the class.py file
